feed.title: YTPTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.1
entry.content:
• 15ab126 external packages updates by @arabcoders
  • 432f277 respect auto_start when re-queuing item by @arabcoders
  • 918b11f do not consider auto_start False items as stale by @arabcoders
  • 1fbe80c allow custom PPs by @arabcoders
  • 3918fa0 hard reset YTDLPOpts. by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.2
entry.content: • da6bd95 Fix threading issue on windows exe by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.4
entry.content:
• c6535f0 Update the pyinstaller build to include version number. by @arabcoders
  • 92a6101 Add exception catch for sub download task by @arabcoders
  • bac1a51 Do not register signals in non posix OS by @arabcoders
  • 7e4fd51 fix windows build by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.5
entry.content:
• 2bfa45e vscode luncher updates by @arabcoders
  • 48fb353 Added force download switch by @arabcoders
  • 2d82737 Add configurable download_path depth env to control auto complete depth by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.7.0
entry.content:
• 59508b5 Add new version notification for WebUI by @arabcoders
  • 1589e73 Implement a way to mark items from task as already downloaded. by @arabcoders
  • 7b0cb87 make it clear we are doing something with playlist items. by @arabcoders
  • a308435 Fixed a bug in DownloadQueue by @arabcoders
